workshops.title: AI & Machine Learning
workshops.description: Explore the fundamentals of artificial intelligence and machine learning with hands-on examples and real-world applications.

workshops.title: Mobile Development
workshops.description: Learn modern mobile app development using React Native and Flutter, from basics to deployment.

workshops.title: Cloud Computing
workshops.description: Discover cloud platforms, containerization with Docker, and scalable application deployment.

workshops.title: Cybersecurity
workshops.description: Learn ethical hacking techniques, security assessment tools, and best practices for secure development.

workshops.title: Data Science
workshops.description: Analyze big data, create visualizations, and build predictive models using Python and R.

workshops.title: Professional Skills
workshops.description: Enhance your resume, prepare for interviews, and develop essential soft skills for career success.
